name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
I. Important texts for the class:
1. Good Chats (3rd edition),by Sandsberry, Sorenson, and Ring. Taipei: Bookman, 2008.
2. Essential Idioms in English (New Edition), by Dixson. New York: Pearson Education, 1994.
3.  Animation films by Miyazaki  ( for classroom discussions)
II. Syllabus:
Unit One: Advanced idioms Lessons 28-30
Week 1 Introduction
Week 2 Conversation topic: Sleep
Week 3 Conversation topic: Family
Week 4 Conversation topic: Friends
Unit Two: Advanced idioms Lessons 31-33
Week 5 Conversation topic: Dating
Week 6 Conversation topic: Parenthood and raising kids
Week 7 Conversation topic: Women
Week 8 Conversation topic: Men
Unit Three: Advanced idioms Lessons 34-36
Week 9  Conversation topic: Beauty
Week 10 Conversation topic: Childhood
Week 11 Conversation topic: Sports
Week 12 Conversation topic: Food
Unit Four:Advanced idioms Lessons 37-39
Week 13 Conversation topic: Work
Week 14 Conversation topic: Time
Week 15 Conversation topic: The Internet
Week 16 Conversation topic: Money
Wrapping up
Week 17 Conversation topic: Value
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
I. Weekly performance in classroom participation and dialogue presentation: 5% X 16 = 80%
II. Final project presentation, including script and performance: 20%
materials:
1. Good Chats (3rd edition),by Sandsberry, Sorenson, and Ring. Taipei: Bookman, 2008.
2. Essential Idioms in English (New Edition), by Dixson. New York: Pearson Education, 1994.
3. Dictionary of Idioms, by Terban.  New York:  Scholastic, 1996.
4.Idioms Made Easy:  Stories of Selected English Idioms. By Tseng and Kao. Taipei: Bookman, 2004.
